name: Geo Expedition
description:
Beware : This is an Early Prototype and fate of project unknown 

‎ ‎

Made by Cem Kaan Ugur under just 2 weeks to test out an idea

‎ ‎

How To Play

it's an exploration game.

although there is a timer on the top left corner.It's a relaxing game so play it on your own pace.

You will see a random continent name appear on the top side of your screen and you can use your minimap - compass to drive there

If you go to the correct one. It's color will change and you need to find the next continent  

‎ ‎

Controls

   w              |              

a  s  d          |           Move Around

ESC or M   |           Open Map

‎ ‎

Frequently Asked Questions

‎

1.You want to report a bug or have a feature request

You can use this link to send feedback. (just takes under 1 minute).

I'm open to all positive/negative feedback as long as it's constructive

‎ ‎

2.No Sounds!!!

Don't worry your headphones aren't broken.Since this an early preview build game doesn't have any sound at the moment.

‎ ‎‎‎

3.Art Style

Currently most of the in-game art are just placeholders.But i think i'm going to keep this abstract voxel style in the future.

‎ ‎‎‎

4.Performance

Because it's an early test.Game hasn't been optimized for low-end computers but if it's literally unplayable you can send feedback with your pc specs and i will try my best to keep that in mind when optimizing.

‎ ‎‎‎

5.Continents Not Countries

I know they are continents but the game has been planned with countries in mind which aren't ready for this test and i'm too lazy to swap all of the texts :)

P.S. You can send feedback in any language. I will try my best to read all of them
